scenario: A attacker with credentials to an account can use the account activity information to track a user's real identity.
An attacker can spoof his location/device to mimic a user.
An attacker with credentials could prove usage of a vpn.
An attacker who compromises an account activity source like apps.jw could inject false info and hide unauthorized access.
An attacker with stolen credentials could login and logout a lot to bury a significant logged event such an email change.
An attacker can use the forgot password feature to gain access to an account and learn information about a user.
An attacker sends a regex bomb in the user-agent header to consume processing on the server.
